actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to designate the U.S. Army Engineer Waterways Experiment Station in Vicksburg, Mississippi, as the Will M. Whittington Waterways Experiment Station.

summary.text: Designates the Waterways Experiment Station in Vicksburg, Mississippi, as the "Will M. Whittington Waterways Experiment Station."

titles.title: A bill to designate the U.S. Army Engineer Waterways Experiment Station in Vicksburg, Mississippi, as the Will M. Whittington Waterways Experiment Station.
